title: Chancellor of Germany - Wikipedia

title: List of chancellors of Germany - Wikipedia
snippet: The office was created in the North German Confederation in 1867, when Otto von Bismarck became the first chancellor. With the unification of Germany and establishment of the German Empire in 1871, the Confederation evolved into a German ...

title: List of Chancellors of Germany (1871-2025)
snippet: One notable leader is Otto von Bismarck, who unified Germany in 1871 and served as its first chancellor. In the 20th century, Konrad Adenauer became the first chancellor of West Germany after World War II, leading from 1949 to 1963.

title: Adolf Hitler is named chancellor of Germany | January 30, 1933 | HISTORY
snippet: On January 30, 1933, President Paul von Hindenburg names Adolf Hitler, leader or f√ºhrer of the National Socialist German Workers Party (or Nazi Party), as chancellor of Germany.
